1.name: Icon of Life
1.description: Dispels positive effects from all enemies, heals own HP, and activates [Flow Control] to change its flow.

2.name: Ruler of Waterfalls
2.description: Creates a massive droplet above the target and drops it, dealing M.DMG to all enemies and dealing additionally continuous M.DMG for a short period of time. While in [Waterfall] state, the Skill ignores DMG Reduction effects, stuns, and reduces enemies's Mana. While on [Sea] state, self temporarily takes increased DMG.

3.name: Icon of the Sea
3.description: Creates the flow of a gaint ocean, dispelling positive effects from all enemies, and dealing M.DMG. While in [Sea] state, launches an attack that ignores Block and knocks enemies far away, and reduces ATK Spd. While in [Waterfall] state, self temporarily takes increased DMG.

4.name: Flow Control
4.description: When Sekmaha's CC gauge is depleted, the flow changes. If Sekmaha is in Waterfall state, changes the flow to Sea, and vice-versa. [Sea] - All enemies cannot heal HP, and increases DMG the enemies deal based on the amount of their Mana. [Waterfall] - Greatly reduces Mana Recovery of all enemies, and reduces DMG the enemies take based on the ammount of their Mana.

5.name: Guardian of Sekireinel
5.description: A Guardian of Sekireinel is blessed with a mighty power that prevents its DEF and ATK Spd from being affected. Additionally, in Stage 6 or above. Sekmaha generates a droplet barrier from time to time.
